extension_description.message: Translate web pages to multiple languages using your choice of translation provider. Configure up to 5 preferred languages.

select_languages_hint.message: Select up to 5 preferred languages for quick translation

kagi_description.message: Uses Kagi's FastGPT for high-quality, private translations with no tracking

google_description.message: Fast and reliable translations using Google's translation service

choose_languages_hint.message: Choose from the list below to add translation buttons

preview_description.message: Your popup will show these translation buttons:

settings_close_hint.message: Settings page will close automatically after saving

click_settings_hint.message: Click Settings to add your preferred languages

extension_disabled_description.message: This extension is disabled on translation service pages to prevent conflicts.

navigate_hint.message: Navigate to any other page to use the translation features.

save_failed.message: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
